nodes.text: The Antique Military Collector's Guide was a written guide for collecting military antiques, such as stormtrooper armor. Karr Nuq Sin, a Force-sensitive teenager who collected such items in the hopes they would trigger glimpses of the antiques' history with his power of psychometry, owned a copy of the Guide on a datapad. The guide gave details about how much military antiques could be bought and sold for, and revealed that he had been overpaying and spending too many credits. When Maize Raynshi, a new friend who attended Nuq Sin's school, discovered his copy on a datapad in his home and asked what the publication told him, he admitted that was what he had learned.
The Antique Military Collector's Guide was first mentioned in Force Collector, a 2019 young adult novel by Kevin Shinick.
